channel.title: Home command problem
channel.description:
Hei, i have a problem when i make the home command code...
I have some picture so you gonna see what's going on. If u know please help me :)
First here is my commands of teleportation to home
[img]http://www.shrani.si/f/3M/oj/1NN06dNN/command.png[/img]
But latter i've added this && playerRights >= 0 to command so let's see what was then wrong when i've compiled
[img]http://www.shrani.si/f/2n/11Z/4pABnHh5/8erros.png[/img]
And a little bit latter i deleted this && playerRights >= 0 so next was compiling and than 0.0 i had like 100 erros :S
[img]http://www.shrani.si/f/2z/12q/2rR8THvb/100-erros.png[/img]
If anyone know what's the problem please help me ! thx =) And yah sorry for my bad english =P

yeh m8 thx got it worksss thx both of u !!! need anything or any siggy, or something PS ME im good with it

item.title: Home command problem
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

Change “equalsIgnorecase” to “equalsIgnoreCase”.

Methods are case sensitive.

Read full topic

item.title: Home command problem
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnorecase("home") && playerRights >= #) { toX = ''''; toY = ''''; }

‘’’’ = coords

staff rights or anything…

if (command.equalsIgnorecase("home")) { toX = ''''; toY = ''''; }

use any of those, hopefully work, if not send errors.

Read full topic

item.title: Home command problem
item.dc:creator: @darixx darixx
item.description:
@darixx wrote:

Luke thanks but look i’ve added playrights 0 but when i compile there’re errors…

Read full topic

item.title: Home command problem
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

ok,

let me go through this with you.

playerRight 0 = normal player
1 = mod
2 = admin
3 = owner

now, you added

&& playerRights >= 0

that bascially does nothing to the command if you are wanting it for normal player and above.

if you wanted it in the code though, it will be like so:

if (command.equalsignorecase("home") && playerRights >= 1) {

if you deleted it would be exact same code that you are showing us.

your error is bascially saying that you dont need the extra ( befor playerrights and so you only need 1 ).

your second error is probabily around the same thing…

you only need to add the playerrights onto your code if you want it for staff+…

so really, you command is good.

Read full topic
